item.title: Changing LDAP settings in an OBIEE RPD with UDML
item.description: A chap called Kevin posted a comment on a previous posting of mine asking did you ever come across anything that could be used to change the LDAP server settings from a command line (admintool.exe, UDML, or otherwise)? I did a quick play around with some UDML and it appears that you can. Set up the initial LDAP server definition in the RPD First I added a dummy LDAP server to samplesales.
